author: liyin
msg: [master] Support startRow and stopRow in endpoint.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9704] Set caching in TableServers.testTableOnlineState to the value set in the scan.
Summary: TableServers.testTableOnlineState used to loop around looking for 1 row at a time which is very sub optimal.
Test Plan: Simple change. Tested on calypso.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9704] Fail the client creation if it fails for more than rpcTimeout

Summary: While creating the thrift client, the get() on the future waits indefinitely. Instead, waiting with a timeout equal to the RPC timeout makes more sense. Ideally, this should be done internally in thrift.

author: liyin
msg: Summary: HTableClientScanner now fetches data on the background, `ParallelScanner` can be simplified.

author: liyin
msg: [master] Fix RPC compression bug for titan
Send the length of the compression data in RPC response, otherwise we cannot establish boundrary between responses.
This requires protocol change, so the procotol version number is bumped up, the new server will be able to serve old clients, but the new clients will not work with old servers.
Ran new servers with old clients, observed the same failure pattern with TF;
Ran new servers with new clients, no more missing put responses.
